content: <?xml version="1.0"?> <vocabulary id="entry_type"> <terms> <term> <id>Compilation</id> <description>A data compilation, e.g. bathymetric grid composed of data from many cruises, a Fledermous scene, earthquake catalog, table of derived GPS velocities from many campaigns, etc.</description> </term> <term> <id>ECL</id> <description>Collection of Geochemical data, methods or software that has been registered in the EarthChem Library (ECL)</description> </term> <term> <id>Field:Airborne</id> <description>Field data acquired using an airborne platform</description> </term> <term> <id>Field:Land</id> <description>Field programs that acquire data using a land based platform</description> </term> <term> <id>Field:Marine</id> <description>Field programs that acquire data aboard a marine platform.</description> </term> <term> <id>Field:Marine:Docked</id> <description>Marine entry that is at a moored or docked position. Ex. Open Periods, Maintenance, Dry Dock; valid data may be collected</description> </term> <term> <id>Field:Marine:Transit</id> <description>Field work in a marine environment during a transit between funded surveys: may contain data</description> </term> </terms> </vocabulary>
